name: Invoice Intake, OCR, and ERP Posting
description: Ingest digital and scanned invoices, extract key fields, validate against POs/budgets, and post to ERP with exception handling and human review for edge cases.

banned_tools: Unvetted third-party OCR with data retention

llm_insights: Line-item extraction improves matching accuracy vs header-only.
Schema validation catches systematic vendor formatting errors.
llm_challenges: Low-quality scans and vendor layout variance.
llm_recommended_approach: Use OCR with light OpenCV pre-processing when needed; apply rule+ML extraction; validate via jsonschema and PO/budget checks; queue exceptions to AP reviewers.
